title: IBM Applied DevOps Engineering Certificate
content: Dean Didion has successfully completed the online, non-credit Professional Certificate in IBM Applied DevOps Engineering. In this Professional Certificate, learners mastered DevOps practices, Agile methodologies, and Cloud Native Technologies. The holders of this certificate completed numerous hands-on labs and projects to gain practical DevOps experience. They utilized Scrum and wrote and executed agile user stories using a Kanban board; built and deployed Python microservices using Docker containers, Kubernetes, OpenShift, and Serverless; developed and executed unit tests with test-driven development (TDD) methods; applied the process of Continuous Integration / Continuous Development (CI/CD) with GitHub Actions and Tekton, added monitoring, logging and observability, and ensured security. The completers of the Professional Certificate are now ready to take on Software Engineering challenges using a DevOps mindset. The online specialization named in this certificate may draw on material from courses taught on-campus, but the included courses are not equivalent to on-campus courses. Participation in this online specialization does not constitute enrollment at this university. This certificate does not confer a University grade, course credit or degree, and it does not verify the identity of the learner. Verify this certificate at: https://coursera.org/verify/professional-cert/YG2HCI8SQXHH

title: Personal Reference Letter for Dean
content:
Payoneer Germany GmbH
Phone: +49 (89) 41 41 447 0
Managing Director: Scott Galit, Keren
Deutsche Bank
Ganghoferstr. 39

This is to certify that Dean has been employed as a Senior Engineering Manager for the Merchant Management and Merchant Onboarding team at Payoneer for a period of two and a half years. During this tenure, Dean has made significant contributions to the organization and demonstrated exemplary skills and expertise in various aspects of the role.

As the Senior Engineering Manager, Dean led a team consisting of 5 Backend, 3 Frontend, 3 delivery/quality assurance engineers, and 2 designers. The team was responsible for the development and maintenance of critical portals, including the Merchant Orchestration Portal, New Checkout Portal, and Stand-alone Merchant Portal for Checkout.

Under Dean's leadership, the team handled a wide range of responsibilities, encompassing design, user interface (UI), user experience (UX), and core services for the entire organization. This included the development of essential services such as authentication and authorization, onboarding APIs, and merchant configuration APIs.

As the first engineering manager hired for this role, Dean played a vital role in building and shaping the team from its inception. This involved actively participating in the recruitment and onboarding process and establishing a solid infrastructure to support the team's operations as well as making a big contribution in onboarding other Engineering Managers as they were hired into the organization. Dean's efforts were instrumental in creating a strong foundation and setting the stage for subsequent engineers to thrive.

Throughout the tenure, Dean demonstrated exceptional managerial skills, effective communication, and a dedication to mentoring team members. By leveraging their extensive knowledge of different Agile frameworks, Dean introduced and implemented numerous processes that significantly enhanced the team's performance. These processes were so successful that they were subsequently adopted by other teams within the organization.

Furthermore, Dean organized workshops at both the team and organizational levels, fostering a culture of continuous learning and knowledge sharing. These initiatives played a crucial role in increasing the collective knowledge base of the team and breaking down silos between different departments.

Dean's work consistently exhibited a high level of quality, earning the admiration and recognition of both peers and direct reports. Their commitment to excellence, leadership abilities, and expertise in the field of engineering management have been invaluable to the success of the organization.

Therefore, it is with great pleasure that we acknowledge Dean's contributions and recommend them as an outstanding Senior Engineering Manager with a proven track record of achieving exceptional results. We extend our sincere appreciation for their dedication and significant impact during their tenure at Payoneer.

title: Dean Didion's Resume
content: CONTACT +49 0151 1799 6699 dean.didion@icloud.com Portfolio GitHub LinkedIn TECHNICAL SKILLS Project Management Agile Leadership & Methodologies AI Engineering LLMs AI Ethical Officer Data Science CI/CD SDLC DEAN DIDION IT MANAGER / ENGINEERING MANAGER WORK EXPERIENCE PROFILE A seasoned IT Project and Engineering Manager with a focus on AI technologies such as LangChain, LangGraph, Machine Learning, and Data Science. Expertise in spearheading cross-functional teams and refining agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, Hybrid). Proficient in recruitment, onboarding, and nurturing a culture of improvement, delivering high-impact solutions and overseeing global collaborations. Jan 2024 - Present Remote SureStride Founder & CEO Founded and led a successful Agile coaching enterprise, implementing customized methodologies that increased team productivity by 30%. Designed and delivered targeted training programs, streamlined processes, and introduced continuous improvement frameworks, leading to a 25% reduction in project delivery times and improved cross-functional collaboration. Advised engineering teams and leadership on agile best practices, fostering a culture of adaptability and iterative development that enhanced stakeholder engagement and product quality. Aug 2023 - May 2024 Edinburgh / Singapore LifeScience Technology LTD CTO (Freelance) Defined and led the technical strategy for an early-stage startup, building and managing high-performing distributed engineering teams across Singapore and the UK. Directed end-to-end technical hiring and mentorship programs, establishing a scalable engineering foundation and fostering a performance-driven team culture. May 2021 - Oct 2023 Munich, Germany Payoneer (Nasdaq: PAYO) Sr. Engineering Manager Spearheaded multiple greenfield projects, including Checkout and the OKR program, successfully adopted across teams in Germany, the UK, and Israel, driving alignment and strategic execution. Led monthly Agile transformation workshops and mentored three cross-functional engineering teams, enhancing effectiveness and interdepartmental collaboration, resulting in improved delivery speed and stakeholder engagement. May 2019 - Nov 2020 Töging, Germany ViscoTec GmbH Head of Customer Support Established a customer support division from the ground up, optimizing operations and increasing customer satisfaction by 35% through improved processes. title: Professional Certificate in IBM AI Developer
content: Rav Ahuja has successfully completed the online, non-credit Professional Certificate IBM AI Developer. In this Professional Certificate, learners acquired the core knowledge and practical skills to build web applications and generative AI-powered solutions. They acquired a foundational understanding of the concepts related to programming and the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC). They learned about the concepts, techniques, and applications related to AI, including generative AI and prompt engineering. The certificate holder has demonstrated their ability to design and develop web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, and Flask and build chatbots and innovative solutions using generative AI-powered models, tools, and technologies. The certificate holder is prepared for a promising career in AI development and software engineering, specializing in generative AI. The online specialization named in this certificate may draw on material from courses taught on-campus, but the included courses are not equivalent to on-campus courses. Participation in this online specialization does not constitute enrollment at this university. This certificate does not confer a University grade, course credit or degree, and it does not verify the identity of the learner. Verify this certificate at: https://coursera.org/verify/professional-cert/FH69YBY7P8O9

title: Dean Didion - IT Manager / Engineering Manager CV

PROFILE
A seasoned IT Project and Engineering Manager, I bring a robust focus on AI technologies such as LangChain, LangGraph, Machine Learning, and Data Science. My expertise lies in spearheading cross-functional teams, catalyzing AI-centric innovation, and refining agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, Hybrid). Proficient in recruitment, onboarding, and nurturing a culture of perpetual improvement, I thrive in delivering high-impact solutions and overseeing global collaborations.

Jan 2024 - Present
Remote
SureStride
Founder & CEO
Founded and led a successful Agile coaching enterprise, implementing customized methodologies that increased team productivity by 30% on average. Designed and delivered targeted training programs, streamlined processes, and introduced continuous improvement frameworks, leading to a 25% reduction in project delivery times and improved cross-functional collaboration. Advised engineering teams and leadership on agile best practices, fostering a culture of adaptability and iterative development that enhanced stakeholder engagement and product quality.

Edinburgh / Singapore

Defined and led the technical strategy for an early-stage startup, building and managing high-performing distributed engineering teams across Singapore and the UK. Directed end-to-end technical hiring and mentorship programs, establishing a scalable engineering foundation and fostering a performance-driven team culture.

Spearheaded multiple greenfield projects, including Checkout and the OKR program, which was successfully adopted across all teams in Germany, the UK, and Israel, driving alignment and strategic execution. Led monthly Agile transformation workshops and mentored three cross-functional engineering teams, enhancing team effectiveness and interdepartmental collaboration, resulting in improved delivery speed and stakeholder engagement.

Established a customer support division from the ground up, optimizing operations and increasing customer satisfaction by 35% through improved processes and service efficiency.

Led the development of a global service network for a top pharmaceutical firm, optimizing procedures and cutting installation time by 20%. This initiative drove a 70% increase in client satisfaction, enhancing service efficiency and customer experience.

Sep 2000 - Mar 2016
Canada, Australia, USA, Germany
Giesecke & Devrient GmbH
IT Project Manager / Software Engineer
Directed global EMV card processing strategies, enhancing operational efficiency and security measures, concurrently fostering the development of high-performing teams.

title: Generative AI for Educators Certificate
